message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.DB

Reasoning: 
1. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) - The paper deals with the task of novelty detection in text streams, which is a subfield of information retrieval. 
2. cs.CL (Computation and Language) - The paper involves natural language processing techniques such as document representation and similarity measures. 
3. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The paper proposes a new approach to novelty detection using a resource-aware mechanism, which involves machine learning techniques. 
4. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - The paper discusses the time complexity and memory usage of the proposed approach, which are important aspects of data structures and algorithms. 
5. cs.DB (Databases) - The paper deals with the efficient handling of massive text streams, which involves database management techniques.
